ValidationRule.description: Resubmission Type must be 'Appeal Decision' if App Status is 'Rejected' Resubmission Type must be 'More Info' is App Status is 'More Info' or 'Returned to Submitter'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && RecordType.Name == 'Lease' && OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c, 'Rejected'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resubmission_Type_Picklist__c, 'Appeal Decision')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c, 'More Info'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resubmission_Type_Picklist__c, 'More Info')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Opportunity_Status__c , 'Fraud More Info Requested')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c,'Auto More Info'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resubmission_Type_Picklist__c, 'More Info')) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Resubmission Type must be 'Appeal Decision' if App Status is 'Rejected' Resubmission Type must be 'More Info' is App Status is 'More Info' or 'Returned to Submitter'
